description: Standard relationship types for bipartite knowledge graph edges. Bip accepts any string, but tools should use these standard types by default. Extensions to this vocabulary are allowed and encouraged when justified â€” but should be agreed upon before use (e.g., added to this file with a clear description).

paper-paper.description: Source builds upon or extends work in target
Source presents findings that contradict target
Source applies methods from target to new domain
Source uses target as foundational work

paper-concept.description: Paper uses concept as a tool/method
Paper creates computational/mathematical model of this phenomenon
